title: Watch: Police pull guns on girl dressed as Star Wars character because some Karen thought her toy gun was real
description:
May the 4th is known as Star Wars Day. You know, May the Force Be with You? May the 4th? This is the May? Don't look at me like that, I don't make the rules. It's a day for brands to show how hip and cool they are with lame Star Wars references to their products. Though it appears that no one told Canada's Finest about this. They saw a stormtrooper with a gun about to do Darth Vader's evil bidding, so they attacked.

Turned out it was just a girl in a costume. Also, the gun was plastic.

Happy #May4thBeWithYou! Remember that time Canadian police arrested a Stormtrooper because they thought her fake gun was real? pic.twitter.com/8pAvCTuwn3
— Louder with Crowder Dot Com (@LWCnewswire) May 4, 2023
“We had music playing in the parking lot, we had one of our staff dress up as a stormtrooper kind of waving to people walking up and down the road, we had people stopping by and getting pictures with the stormtrooper, we put a couple of promotions on in the restaurant to entice people to come."

Obviously, the cops were Star Trek fans. Or idiots. Or idiot Star Trek fans, Trekkies being the inferior fandom. Think DC Comics nerds versus the vastly superior Marvel Comics.

[Some] members of the public must have seen her brandishing a plastic toy blaster believing it was a real gun and phoned police. Lethbridge Police Service (LPS) Inspector Jason Walper says they got two 911 calls regarding a firearms complaint near the business on 13 Street North. “

What's scary is that this story took place in 2020. Think about how much more terrifying Canada has gotten toward guns since then.

Police officers had guns drawn, pointed at my employee. They were yelling at her to put the gun down so she threw the plastic gun on the ground. At that point in time when I came out, she was on her knees kneeling down on the ground. The police had already checked and seen that the gun was plastic so they already knew that there wasn't an issue or a risk there."

Back to the knuckleheads who need to have their badges taken away from them and put on permanent desk duty. "Officer, there's a space man standing outside of the pizza place with a laser gun. I think it's a terrorist attack." NO ONE had the common sense to say that was a little off? Or even if Karen and her neighbor Other Karen called and said there is someone across the street with a gun, surely the fact that it was someone dancing in a Halloween costume should have clued the county mounties in on it. Dudley Do-Right is a more competent lawman. Or even Steven Wright's character from Canadian Bacon.

I'm from the last generation that was allowed to play with realistic-looking, black plastic guns. They started painting toy guns bright colors because authorities might see a twelve years old with a bazooka and think it was real. Me and my other ten-year-old friends thought no one could be that stupid. Turns out we were wrong.

It's shocking to believe that there could be something more embarrassing to the Star Wars Universe than the Han Solo origin story. Congratulations, Canada. You did it.

>

<

title: Watch: What the media isn't telling you about the homeless NYC man choked out by a Marine
description:
Without a doubt, you’re aware of the increase in violent crime in our nation's cities. And you’ve probably heard a lot about the incident in a New York City subway where a Marine choked out a homeless man who died.

So according to a Facebook page, THIS is the FULL video of the Hobo Floyd incident.

And would you look at that, it turns out there were MULTIPLE people restraining Jordan Neely down while waiting for police.

EVERY SINGLE ONE OF THESE LEFTISTS DEIFYING THAT BUM CAN EAT SHIT. pic.twitter.com/ymD0Amzlum
— Isaiah L. Carter, # 16,080 (@IsaiahLCarter) May 4, 2023

The victim's name is Jordan Neely. The Marine's name is, as of now, unknown.

According to a witness, 30-YO Jordan Neely barged onto the train and started yelling at riders that he was "ready to die."

He said he had no food, he had no drink, that he was tired and doesn’t care if he goes to jail. He started screaming all these things, took off his jacket, a black jacket that he had, and threw it on the ground.

A man being reported as a 24-YO Marine veteran subdued Neely and placed him in a chokehold. The Marine was questioned by police but later released.

Leftists are already trying to set a narrative:

  • "A homeless man was murdered."
  • "The crime was racially motivated."
  • "The victim was just a fun-loving Michael Jackson."

Crowder goes through the FACTS of the case one by one on today's show.

title: Anheuser-Busch issues another statement on Bud Light disaster, claims it was "just one can"
description:
Anheuser-Busch is at it again with another excuse. The company is still trying to fix the disaster stemming from the brand ambassadorship given to TikTok ingénue and titface performer Dylan Mulvaney. As well as the Vice President of Marketing's comments insulting the beer's fan base.

That free beer A-B is sending out to distributors? It comes with a note. The St. Louis Post Dispatch reports the company claims in the letter it was only "one single can given to one social media influencer," that it "was not made for production or sale to the general public," and the can "is not a formal campaign or advertisement."

There was also some buck-passing, and it sounds like the former VP of marketing is on much more than a leave of absence as we expected.

“In reality, the Bud Light can posted by a social media influencer that sparked all the conversation was provided by an outside agency without Anheuser-Busch management awareness or approval,. Since that time, the lack of oversight and control over marketing decisions has been addressed and a new VP of Bud Light marketing has been announced.”

So, we're supposed to believe Dylan Mulvaney bought a case of Bud Light himself, recorded a video promoting Bud Light's March Madness coverage, and second more produced a video in a bathtub on her own, and they did this WITHOUT the endorsement of Anheuser-Busch.

Former A-B Chief Creative Officer Robert Lachky doesn't think the company realizes HOW big they screwed up.

The minute you step into the political or religious spectrum, when you know your target audience is going to have a real issue with this, you know you’ve alienated at least half of your target audience. In the end, people don’t like getting preached to, especially when it comes to drinking beer.

Other companies are starting to get the message too. We see you, Coca-Cola.

A-B should try three simple words to their customers: "we" and "f*cked" and "up."

>

<

title: Watch: Student speaks out after transwoman whipped out her penis in girls bathroom, assaulted smaller girl who disagreed
description:
There was a fight between two girls at Martin Luther King High School in Riverside, California. One girl towered over the other girl. She was the transgender girl. The one born with the penis that led to the fight. The smaller girl didn't want to see it dangling around in the girls' bathroom. The transgirl started throwing punches. One student, Megan Simpkins, spoke out to the school board wanting to know why no one cares about the safety of female students.

I should note when the story first came out, there was some confusion as to if the assailant was trans or not. One media outlet identified her as trans. Another media outlet refused to use the student's preferred pronouns and/or wanted to hide the fact that the student was trans.

High school senior, Megan Simpkins, unloaded on her school in an explosive speech three days after they allowed a giant trans student to assault a girl in the girls locker room. pic.twitter.com/GeAAR25JkO
— Dr. PMS (@ps1ack) May 4, 2023

Megan wants to know why a biological man, one who likes whipping his/her junk out, was allowed in the HIGH SCHOOL girls' bathroom. Megan is of the old-timey belief that girls should feel safe in schools, and that the school board and educators should care about how these ladies (the one's born that way) feel.

The question we must address is why are we affirming the mental confusion of this boy and putting the safety of women in jeopardy by allowing mentally confused men to use women’s spaces?
Why don’t we ever get a say in whether or not we are comfortable with this? The truth is we aren’t, the majority of us aren’t, and yet nothing has been done to protect the safety of these women. I will conclude with this it all starts with you. You are in charge of the safety of us women.

The answer to this question is simple: shut the f*ck up, you transphobic TERF. As we have seen, the opinion of girls and women concerned about their safety doesn't matter. As long as transgender sits atop the left's pound-for-pound most marginalized rankings, they call the shots.

What the answer SHOULD be is for the school board to be apologize profusely and tender their resignations for failing students. But it's 2023 and that's not the world we live in.

>

<

title: Watch: College campus goes berserk on conservative with controversial opinion "minors can't consent to puberty blockers"
description:
Billboard Chris paid a visit to Portland State University. His name is Chris. He wears a billboard. It's a neat little gimmick. But it was the words on his billboard that cause a commotion.

Chris is passionate about his belief that minors can't consent to being injected with puberty blockers. His trip to PSU was intended to find like-minded people who agreed with this belief he holds dear. After all, saying that minors can't consent to puberty blockers that do irreversible damage to kids before they understand the consequences sounds like something we can all find common ground on.

Yet, there are critics who call that transphobia. And they attend PSU.

PSU- @BillboardChris is wearing his “Children Cannot Consent to puberty blockers sign” at Portland State University.

A very loud and angry trans activist has already arrived and is now singing loudly to try and stop all conversations pic.twitter.com/wZoNto9teo
— Savanah Hernandez (@sav_says_) May 3, 2023

This student protested Chris being there by singing the Cardi B classic "WAP," which stands for "wet ass pussy." Pussy is a euphemism for "vagina," the sexual reproductive organ that up until recently was found exclusively on women. And when you stimulate the vagina it gets... anyway, it would appear this student disagrees with Chris's billboard.

PSU- A braless student begins screaming and singing the verses from “WAP” in an attempt to shut down @BillboardChris and @realJamesKlug from speaking to students about trans surgery for kids: pic.twitter.com/dRozI1I4H0
— Savanah Hernandez (@sav_says_) May 3, 2023

Then you had this clown, who upon reading that minors can't consent to puberty blockers, grew angry. It's unclear why he was so angry. He didn't present a dissenting argument as much tell Chris he's an idiot who should shut the f*ck up and then move into a cave and die.

PSU- An extremely angry man has been screaming that @BillboardChris should “shut the f*ck up” and “move to a cave and die” because he’s an idiot.

The man cannot explain what about Chris has angered him, he just continues screaming, “f*ck you” pic.twitter.com/HlZrBhYq5k
— Savanah Hernandez (@sav_says_) May 3, 2023

It is unclear at this time if Chris met anyone in Portland who agrees that minors cannot consent to taking puberty blockers. We here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website will update this post should that information become available.

>

<

title: Politifact's pathetic attempt to cape for teachers' union mob boss Randi Weingarten... GETS fact-checked by Twitter
description:
Who fact-checks the fact-checkers? Community Notes fact-checks the fact-checkers! Suck it, Politifact.

Leftists are attempting to rewrite history and gaslight Americans into believing they didn't support closing schools during the pandemic. Or at the very least, locking them down for years longer than they needed to be. Most notably, teachers' union mob boss Randi Weingarten.

Over the past week or two, Randi has had her failures thrown back in her face over and over again. So, of course, the "independent" "fact" checkers at Politifact were dispatched to save the day.

Teachers union President Randi Weingarten advocated for reopening schools with pandemic safety measures. She criticized the Trump administration’s 2020 calls to reopen schools fully, but it’s misleading to claim that she opposed reopening at all. https://t.co/Km8FkMkXd2
— PolitiFact (@PolitiFact) May 3, 2023

Unlike other times Politifact has been deployed, the independent fact-checkers at Community Notes are there to provide context that Politifact always seems to miss during their "fact" checks.

  • Called attempts to reopen schools in the fall of 2020 "Reckless, callous, cruel"
  • Pushed aggressively at the local level to keep schools closed
  • Areas with high union influence -- aka, areas run by Democrats -- remained closed much longer
  • The school closings continued well in 2022

There is also a second version of Community Notes that includes all the links you see above, as well as the following tweets from Randi.

100% what @UFT Pres Michael Mulgrew said: "We cannot put the entire city at risk by allowing COVID rates to rise.” https://t.co/o6WfBJVwcp
— Randi Weingarten 🇺🇦🇺🇸💪🏿👩🎓 (@rweingarten) September 30, 2020


This is the way to aggressively stop #covid spread https://t.co/1G6rSRqRMF
— Randi Weingarten 🇺🇦🇺🇸💪🏿👩🎓 (@rweingarten) August 30, 2020


CRIMINAL!! Students in Martin County, FL returned to school Tuesday; already 1 elementary class was quarantined as students showed COVID-19 symptoms. Their teacher is required to report to work even when exposed to #covid under @RonDeSantisFL order. This is why @FloridaEA sued.
— Randi Weingarten 🇺🇦🇺🇸💪🏿👩🎓 (@rweingarten) August 13, 2020


Huge!! Judge strikes down Florida’s school reopening order, says unconstitutional to require ‘brick and mortar’ classes this month Judge requires #safeschoolsreopening Thank you @FloridaEA https://t.co/1BWb9xnQ16
— Randi Weingarten 🇺🇦🇺🇸💪🏿👩🎓 (@rweingarten) August 24, 2020

Unfortunately, we know the scam. Politifact capes for Democrats. Facebook will now use Poltifact's "fact" check to mark any post criticizing Randi Weingarten over school closures as "missing context" and throttle the rest of your contact. It happened with the gas-stoves ban. I have no doubt we'll be getting a notice in a day or so that our reach has been yeeted.

Since we're gonna get throttled anyway, let me also add the teachers' unions colluded with the CDC to keep schools closed. They were busted rewriting the guidelines that kept your kids in masks. Masks, mind you, that Weingarten KNEW impeded learning. Yet it's "misleading" to say Randi opposed reopening.
